body: @sycoral 在你的测试过程中有没有发生主备切换？上面的报错发生在主上面还是备上面？

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/26587305/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/26587305)

Coverage increased (+0.07%) to 50.609% when pulling **9176e05778035e76d9165a3b8e12f116b3ecacd6 on qqeasonchen:dev_bing** into **90ae1167981ad586e84dd433c08395aeb92a4111 on apache:develop**.
@ymhh I have modified the code, could you please help me review and verify it? Thank you.
@supercym Could you please check the review comments?

通过在测试环境进行测试，发现在slave节点中，删除store目录下所有文件，然后进行重启，store目录下的文件和目录可以进行恢复，并且恢复过后，经过测试后，发现服务没有任何问题。于是对该集群，这个异常节点，进行store目录下文件删除操作，然后重启该节点，服务大致有1~2分钟不可用时间（此期间offset不增长，发送消息大量失败）；服务恢复正常后，该异常节点不断从leader节点同步数据，tps非常高；数据同步完后，tps恢复到与leader一致。
其实我也发现这个问题了,很坑,应该有个解决方案来处理,或者给一个补偿方案,而且我现在不光是主节点挡掉从节点挡掉也会有类似的问题出现.我觉得至少补偿方案应该将宕机的Node集群停掉,手工将文件同步后,再将集群拉起来,,不知道是否可行.
没有发生过主备切换，是在从上发生的。
@lance12138 感谢反馈，你能帮忙提个pr改下这个问题吗？
@kofkyobsa Is there any other error when executing the above command?

@skyline1688 DatagramSocket is reserved for future expansion support for UDP protocol, so please don't remove it for a while. and if you are interested in extending this protocol, please feel free to propose a RIP or PR. and I will close this pr first, but please feel free to reopen it if you have other questions.
Okay I got it. thanks for your reply, and if there are some code comments there will be better, it's a good way to avoid confuse.

then I want to know the answer for the above QAs, it will help me save time and avoid mistakes.

Not just `queryMsgByKey`, looks like there is other thing went wrong in `Mqadmin` when `broker` enables `acl`.

I got `org.apache.rocketmq.client.exception.MQBrokerException: CODE: 1  DESC: org.apache.rocketmq.acl.common.AclException: No acl config for rocketmq2, org.apache.rocketmq.acl.plain.PlainPermissionManager.validate(PlainPermissionManager.java:375)
` when run `clusterList`.

Looks like `Mqadmin` need a place to config `acl` info.

This Commit seems break the Unit Test.

Please Fix it @hengyoush Thank you.

hi~ @duhenglucky
i am new to rocketmq. RocketMQ is cool and become more and more popular, so i'd like to help you guys to make the *quick start* more friendly to newbies like me. If there are some errors in my statement, please point out.
here we go, after some investigation, these are what i find:
* the Start Broker part is fine, because parameter `-n locolhost:9876` set the name server.As that's a quick start, if you can put that in configuration file by default, that will be really nice.
* `No route info of this topic problem` error. If i use the same 4.3.0 version client as the official site Simple Example page suggests, the broker(version 4.4.0) won't create topic automatically. however 4.4.0 version client works! My suggestions are:
    1. modify the official site simple example page, modify the client version to 4.4.0  
    2. As that's a quick start for newbie like me, add the `autoCreateTopicEnable = true` to broker config file by default
    3. maybe you can check the code and find the real cause for this bug
* all quick start examples should set name server by default,add some code like `producer.setNamesrvAddr("localhost:9876")`
* default broker jvm memory configuration is `-Xms8g -Xmx8g -Xmn4g`, that's almost kill my poor computer.....  i think you can make it smaller for our poor personal computer~ The professional company guys will configure that option by themselves.

> when sometime I need nameserver expose outside network , but without acl feature,that mean anyone can add un safe broker to rocketmq ?
> 
> or just need a token something to checkout broker identity ？

Actually,in rocketmq cloud enviroment or cases,your using namesrv to expose outside network is not a better choice.  @forfuns
This issue will be resolve by this pr(https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1430)

hi~ @RongtongJin
your code have been merged to branch develop, i'd like to test your improvement with client version 4.3.0 and see what will happen.
but i don't know how can i compile from the source and get the broker up. can you help me?
i tried something like:
* `mvn compile` is ok
* `mvn install` is not ok, because some test fail
* `mvn install -DskipTests` is ok and will generate some jar files, then how can i start the name server and broker?

if i ask some stupid questions, please forgive me! i am really new to rocketmq. p.s I am big fan of redis and except i can test the latest rocketmq code very easily with a few command like redis~

hi~ @jimgreen2013 
1. As far as I know, if broker does not set `autoCreateTopicEnable = true`, the new modification will still return `No route info of this topic`. My improvement is mainly for "No route info of tihis topic" caused by some network problem.
2. You can refer to [quick start on the official website](http://rocketmq.apache.org/docs/quick-start/) to start name server and broker.

hi~ @RongtongJin @vongosling @duhenglucky
thanks for your help~ I have do some tests 
Here is the result:
### test case1
* broker version: build from lastest develop branch code
* configuration: `autoCreateTopicEnable = true`
* client version: 4.3.0
* result: `No route info of this topic` **error**

### test case2
* broker version: build from lastest develop branch code
* configuration: `autoCreateTopicEnable = true`
* client version: 4.4.0
* result: everything is ok

### test case3
* broker version: 4.3.0
* configuration: `autoCreateTopicEnable = true`
* client version: 4.3.0
* result: everything is ok

Maybe i guess the new broker version isn't backward with old client version 4.3.0
@jimgreen2013 yep, RocketMQ 4.3.0 version changed the default "TBW102" value, this will lead to some compatibility issues and it is recommended to test with the latest version 4.5.2.
@jimgreen2013 The [pr#1415](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1415) does not modify the code of broker, but the code of client. So you should test with the newest client code in develop branch.

> @qqeasonchen 增加单独的定时任务可以解决这个问题；另外，这里面有三个参数可以改一下来避免这个问题，diskMaxUsedSpaceRatio，diskSpaceCleanForciblyRatio这两个参数跟diskSpaceWarningLevelRatio比较接近的时候，会出现上述问题，也可以修改一下这三个参数，保证留有比较多的空间来及时删除文件。

考虑到修改参数保留较多磁盘空间会使磁盘利用率下降，所以通过增加单独定时任务的方式修改并提了pr。请问提了pr要合并有什么要求么？

Sorry, we are using other programming languages, we can't use fastjson, its json library in other languages is defined as an illegal json, other json libraries including java can't be parsed, which makes your RocketMQ only in the java ecosystem. Use, can't support more platforms
